email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quote. USD 25.50 per MT seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 24.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 24.75 is better. Can we push it to USD 24.50? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 October?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 24.50 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 17-22 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 17-22 October
- Freight: USD 24.50 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily
